mapper.select: SELECT pl.id, pl.user_id, pl.post_id, pl.created_at, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, p.title as post_title, LEFT(p.content, 100) as post_content FROM post_likes pl INNER JOIN users u ON pl.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN posts p ON pl.post_id = p.id WHERE pl.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY pl.created_at DESC
